description: Projects-like task used to track clarinet setup/repair work for a single instrument. Supports scheduling, priority, dependencies, progress roll-up to the parent Clarinet Initial Setup, and Gantt/Kanban list modes.

fields.description: Parent clarinet setup record this task belongs to. Used for filtering, progress roll-up, and navigation.
fields.label: Clarinet Initial Setup

fields.description: Short, action-oriented title for the task (e.g., “Set key heights – upper joint”).
fields.label: Subject

fields.description: Current state of the task within the setup workflow.
fields.label: Status
fields.options:
Open
Working
Paused
Pending Review
Completed
Canceled

fields.description: Percent complete for this task. Automatically set to 100% when status is Completed; contributes to parent roll-up.
fields.label: Progress

fields.description: Planned start date. Enables Gantt view.
fields.label: Expected Start

fields.description: Planned end date. Must be on/after Expected Start. Enables Gantt view.
fields.label: Expected End

fields.description: Timestamp when work actually started (often set when status moves to Working).
fields.label: Actual Start

fields.description: Timestamp when work actually completed (often set when status moves to Completed).
fields.label: Actual End

fields.description: Predecessor tasks that must be Completed before this task can proceed. Each row links to another Clarinet Setup Task.
fields.label: Depends On

fields.description: User primarily responsible for executing the task.
fields.label: Assigned To

fields.description: Detailed procedure, acceptance criteria, measurements, or notes.
fields.label: Description

fields.description: Instrument record for context (auto-filled from parent where possible).
fields.label: Instrument

fields.description: Ordering hint for task lists and generation from templates (use spaced values like 10, 20, 30 to allow inserts).
fields.label: Sequence

fields.description: Optional parent group task (for hierarchical grouping).
fields.label: Parent Task

fields.description: If enabled, indicates this is a grouping node (usually not directly actionable).
fields.label: Is Group

fields.description: Optional color tag for visual grouping in list and Kanban views.
fields.label: Color

fields.description: Serial number of the instrument being serviced (traceability).
fields.label: Serial No

name: Clarinet Setup Task
